body_content.explanation: any of a family of evergreen trees and bushes (= ones that never lose their leaves) from Australia, with usually yellow flowers:
examples: The variety of banksia in my garden has orangey yellow flowers.
Banksia trees have evolved to release their seeds into the hot air in the event of a fire.
More than 75 banksia, melaleucas, eucalyptus and other introduced species in the park have been killed over the past six years.
